sage.input.action

Class MouseLookAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.input.action.AbstractInputAction
      • sage.input.action.MouseLookAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAction

    public class MouseLookAction
extends AbstractInputAction
    MouseLookAction allows an application to perform "mouselook" operations using the mouse X and Y axes to control a camera.
    Author:
    Russell Bolles

      • getMouseLookMode

        public int getMouseLookMode()

        Returns:
        the current recentering mode

      • setLockAxis

        public void setLockAxis(graphicslib3D.Vector3D lockAxis)
        setLockAxis sets the axis that should be locked down. This prevents "rolling" about a particular axis. Typically, this is set to the mouse's up vector. Note this is only a shallow copy.
        Parameters:
        lockAxis - the axis that should be locked down to prevent rolling.

      • getLockAxis

        public graphicslib3D.Vector3D getLockAxis()
        Returns the axis that is currently locked.
        Returns:
        The currently locked axis
